meanings.sent1: The teacher provided a comprehensive explanation of the topic.
meanings.sent2: She conducted a comprehensive review of the document.
meanings.sent3: The detective's comprehensive investigation solved the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her comprehensive knowledge of the subject impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The comprehensive map showed all the roads in great detail.

meanings.definition: Including all or nearly all elements or aspects
meanings.sent1: The comprehensive report included data from all sources.
meanings.sent2: He received a comprehensive overview of the project.
meanings.sent3: The chef's comprehensive recipe left no ingredient out.
meanings.sent4: The comprehensive approach considered every possible solution.
meanings.sent5: The comprehensive list covered every item on the agenda.
